message.content: {"given_definition_quality":95,"better_definition":"fruit (something you can eat that grows on trees or plants, like apples or bananas)","sentence":"我喜欢水果。","image_prompt":"Draw a child holding a big red apple and a yellow banana, both smiling. There are other colorful fruits in a simple bowl on a table in front. The scene is bright and clear, in a soft apocalypse animation style with gentle, surreal backgrounds — the window shows a dreamy, peaceful outside world with pastel ruined buildings and overgrown plants, but everyone is happy and safe inside.","sentence_translation":"I like fruit."}
